what this face is.

author: matty02

comments.content: You’re back on your game, Tiffany.
Actually, seeing that we are in Gotham month here on Typophile, I guess every 3rd post automatically as Gotham. :^D

That is so true - nice when you get those gimmes, innit?

I was gonna throw down Gotham for that WYNN hotel logo until I took a closer look and realized it was Gill Sans.
